details:
A C++11 single-file header-only cross platform HTTP/HTTPS library. It&apos;s extremely easy to setup. Just include httplib.h file in your code!

Security Fix(es):

cpp-httplib version v0.17.3 through v0.18.3 fails to filter CRLF characters ("\r\n") when those are prefixed with a null byte. This enables attackers to exploit CRLF injection that could further lead to HTTP Response Splitting, XSS, and more.(CVE-2025-0825)
